mapper.select: select noticeSeq, noticeSubject, noticeContents, userid, DATE_FORMAT(NoticeRegDay, '%Y-%m-%d'), filepath, fileupload from NOTICE where 1=1 AND noticeSubject like '%${searchTitle}%' ORDER BY noticeSeq desc LIMIT ${rowNum}, ${limitCount};
select noticeSeq, noticeSubject, noticeContents, userid, DATE_FORMAT(NoticeRegDay, '%Y-%m-%d'), filepath, fileupload from NOTICE where 1 = 1 AND NoticeSeq = ${seq};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(noticeSubject, noticeContents, noticeRegDay, UserID) VALUES ('${noticeSubject}', '${noticeContents}', NOW(), '${userid}')
mapper.select: select max(noticeseq) from NOTICE where 1 = 1 and userid = '${userid}';
mapper.update: update NOTICE set noticeSubject = '${noticeSubject}', noticeContents ='${noticeContents}', noticeRegDay = NOW() where 1=1 and noticeseq = ${seq};
